keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
# 取消仅仅按t键打开新标签页
unmap t

# 添加打开特定引擎搜索快捷键
map <c-b> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=bilibili
map <c-B> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=bilibili_collection
map zh Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=zhihu
map <c-o> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=quora
map <c-d> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=duckduckgo
map go Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=google
map gv Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=vovososo
map <a-t> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=fanyi
map <c-i> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=github
map yb Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=youtube
map gl Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=lagou
map aq Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=aiqicha
map ty Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=tianyancha
map ai Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=maimai
map pi Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=boss
map yh Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=yangyang
map <a-y> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=yueyu
map Q visitPreviousTab


# 取消打开剪贴板中网页按钮
unmap P
unmap p

# 快捷键ctrl+q打开剪贴板中的网址或搜索关键词
map <c-q> openCopiedUrlInNewTab

# 取消网页向下、上滚动
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# du: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
google: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s
vovososo: https://g.vovososo.com/search?q=%s
fanyi: https://fanyi.baidu.com#zh/en/%s
bing_fanyi: https://www4.bing.com/dict/search?q=%s
bilibili: https://search.bilibili.com/all?keyword=%s
zhihu: https://www.zhihu.com/search?type=content&q=%s
quora: https://www.quora.com/search?q=%s
doge.com: https://www.dogedoge.com/
duckduckgo: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s
csdn.net: https://mp.csdn.net/
github: https://github.com/search?q=%s
youtube: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s
lagou: https://www.lagou.com/wn/jobs?labelWords=&fromSearch=true&suginput=&kd=%s
aiqicha: https://aiqicha.baidu.com/s?q=%s
tianyancha: https://www.tianyancha.com/search?key=%s
bilibili_collection: https://space.bilibili.com/22670468/favlist?keyword=%s&searchFid=115418968&fid=115418968&type=1
maimai: https://maimai.cn/web/search_center?type=feed&query=%s&highlight=true
boss: https://www.zhipin.com/web/geek/job?query=%s&city=101280600
yangyang: https://shyyp.net/searoh?q=%s
yueyu: https://fanyi.baidu.com#zh/yue/%s
